DOC.brief_summary: This study intend determine whether steroid withdrawal calcineurin inhibitor withdrawal superior graft function graft survival . Secondary endpoint study : incidence tumor cardiovascular event . The primary objective : To assess superior graft function ( glomerular filtration rate ( GFR ) difference 10 ml/min ) achieve 1 year transplantation cohort de novo kidney transplant patient treat Myfortic-everolimus plus steroid compare Myfortic-cyclosporine .
DOC.brief_title: Calcineurin Inhibitor ( CNI ) Versus Steroid Cessation Renal Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: Methodology : - A 5-year , multicentre , prospective , randomize , open-label , control study - Group 1 : Simulect + cyclosporine + Myfortic + steroid stop 3 month - Group 2 : Simulect + cyclosporine ( decrease dose one week month 3 replace everolimus ) + Myfortic + steroid maintenance . - In group MPA AUC monitor do 5-7 day 3 month , ensure sufficient MPA protection . Sample size calculation : A total 152 patient randomize ( 76 patient per group ) Population : De novo kidney transplant recipient . Study duration : 1.5 year inclusion+ follow-up first 5 year
